com.github.dandelion.core.util

Class PropertiesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.util.PropertiesUtils

  • public class PropertiesUtils
extends Object

    Collection of utilities to ease working with Properties.

    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Romain Lespinasse, Thibault Duchateau

    • Method Detail

      • propertyBeginWith

        public static List<String> propertyBeginWith(String prefix,
                             Properties properties)

        Returns a filtered list of properties which begin with the supplied prefix.

        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix used to filter the properties.
        properties - The properties source.
        Returns:
        a filtered list of properties.

      • loadFromFileSystem

        public static Properties loadFromFileSystem(String filePath,
                            String charset)
                                     throws FileNotFoundException,
                                            UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                            IOException

        Returns a Properties instance, loaded from the specified filePath, absolute path in the file system.

        The Properties instance is loaded using the specified named charset .

        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute file path to use in order to load the Properties instance.
        charset - The named charset to use when creating the InputStreamReader.
        Returns:
        a loaded instance of Properties.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the file doesn't exist.
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if the named charset is not supported
        IOException - if any other error occurred when reading from the input stream.

      • loadFromClasspath

        public static Properties loadFromClasspath(String filePath,
                           String encoding)
                                    throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                           IOException

        Returns a Properties instance, loaded from the specified filePath and using the context ClassLoader of the current thread.

        The Properties instance is loaded using the named charset .

        Parameters:
        filePath - The relative file path inside the classpath.
        charset - The named charset to use when creating the InputStreamReader.
        Returns:
        a loaded instance of Properties.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the file doesn't exist.
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if the named charset is not supported
        IOException - if any other error occurred when reading from the input stream.

      • bundleToProperties

        public static Properties bundleToProperties(ResourceBundle bundle)
        Converts the supplied bundle to a Properties.
        Parameters:
        bundle - The ResourceBundle to convert.
        Returns:
        a Properties instance.

      • propertyAsSet

        public static Set<String> propertyAsSet(String values)

        Returns a set from the specified values, using "," as a default delimiter to perform the splip operation.

        Parameters:
        values - a String containing the element to return as a List and containing "," as a default delimiter.
        Returns:
        a set of Strings.

      • propertyAsList

        public static List<String> propertyAsList(String values)

        Returns a list from the specified values, using "," as a default delimiter to perform the splip operation.

        Parameters:
        values - a String containing the element to return as a List and containing "," as a default delimiter.
        Returns:
        a list of Strings.

      • propertyAsList

        public static List<String> propertyAsList(String values,
                          String delimiter)

        Returns a list from the specified values, using the specified delimiter to perform the splip operation.

        Parameters:
        values - a String containing the element to return as a List.
        delimiter - The delimiter to use to perform the split operation against the String.
        Returns:
        a list of Strings.
